description: Settings that describe the behaviour and formatting of rewards corresponding to the configured unit or unit pattern

___config.title: Unit Settings Configuration

___rewardModifications.description: The modifications supported by rewards applicable for this unit setting
___rewardModifications.title: Reward Modifications

___isCancellable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be cancelled via SaaSquatch API/Portal
___isCancellable.title: Is Cancellable

___isRedeemable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be redeemed via SaaSquatch API/Portal
___isRedeemable.title: Is Redeemable

___isExpirable.description: Indicates whether expiration is applicable to this reward of this unit
___isExpirable.title: Is Expirable

___id.description: A unique identifier generated by combining reward type and unit or unit pattern (e.g. t/CREDIT/u/POINTS or t/CREDIT/u/CASH/*)
___id.title: Reward Unit Settings Id
